title: Kofta Kebobs
directions: If using wooden skewers, soak in water for 30 minutes
In the bowl of a food processor add the garlic, onion, ginger, parsley and mint; pulse until finely chopped
Add remaining dried spices and pulse until combined
In a medium bowl add the ground lamb and ground herb and spice mixture; stir with a wooden spoon or use dampened hands to incorporate
Take ¼ cup sized portions and mold it with dampened hands around each skewer, gently pressing into an elongated shape; approximately 6” long
Repeat this step until you have no more mixture
Lay the skewered kebobs on a tray, cover and refrigerate until ready to grill
Place the koftas on a lightly oiled grill and cook for approximately 5 minutes per side
ingredients: 1 pkg New Zealand Spring Lamb® Ground
1” piece fresh ginger, peeled and coarsely chopped
¼ cup fresh parsley, finely chopped
